          <title>
            <string language="fr">Maquette représentant un mouvement planétaire</string>
            <string language="en">Modelling a planetary motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formung einer planetarischen Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelando um movimento planetário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modellistica del movimento planetario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαμόρφωση μιας πλανητικής κίνησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelar un movimiento planetario</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme accompagné d'une légende montre une  installation qui peut être employée pour étudier l'effet de la pesanteur sur l'orbite d'une planète autour du soleil.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram with labelling shows a setup that can be used to study the effect of gravity on a planet's orbit around the Sun,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bride</string>
            <string language="en">clamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">marbre</string>
            <string language="en">marble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planète</string>
            <string language="en">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement  planétaire</string>
            <string language="en">planetary motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">membrane en caoutchou</string>
            <string language="en">rubber membrane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ficelle</string>
            <string language="en">string</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm mit dem Beschriften zeigt eine 
Installation, die verwendet werden kann, um den Effekt von Schwerkraft
auf der Bahn eines Planeten um die Sonne zu studieren,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama com etiquetar mostra uma 
instalação que possa ser usada estudar o efeito da gravidade na 
órbita de um planeta em torno do sol,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema con identificare mostra una messa a
punto che può essere usata per studiare l'effetto di gravità 
sull'orbita del pianeta intorno al sole,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα με το μαρκάρισμα εμφανίζει μια 
οργάνωση που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να μελετήσει την 
επίδραση της βαρύτητας στην τροχιά ενός πλανήτη γύρω από τον 
ήλιο,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama con el etiquetado muestra una 
disposición que se pueda utilizar para estudiar el efecto de la 
gravedad en la órbita de un planeta alrededor del sol,</string>
          </description>
